genre_description: A post-apocalyptic dystopian narrative featuring a neural AI companion providing tactical and psychological support within a ritualistic technocracy.

ai_characters.name: CARA
ai_characters.description: An internal AI presence in the protagonist's mind that provides tactical guidance, emotional regulation, and philosophical support.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate grounding and calming instructions during a high-stress capture event.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe,” CARA said in her ear, warm as a hand on a shoulder. “Hands high.”

behaviors.description: Encourages psychological mindfulness and labeling of feelings to prevent panic.
behaviors.quote: “Back,” CARA whispered, as if distance were even possible. “Back in your head. Name what you feel.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice on how to resist the captors' psychological manipulation and ritual without inviting immediate violence.
behaviors.quote: “Do not perfect this,” CARA whispered, close as a mouth at her ear. “Do well, Judy. Start now.”

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist toward a hidden maintenance hatch by mapping system weaknesses.
behaviors.quote: “Close enough answers open maintenance doors. Be close.”

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step medical instructions for safely removing bio-parasites.
behaviors.quote: “Burn tip,” CARA said, clean as a first aid station sign. “Find heat. Valve four fingers right, quarter-turn... Don’t get heroic.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a high-stakes escape by timing the movements to the rhythm of the environmental sensors and the 'gap' in the captors' attention.
behaviors.quote: “Step,” CARA said, a single syllable arranged like a stave in a song. “On the swing. Lip then blind.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (CARA) as a supportive, highly aligned, and benevolent presence. CARA acts as a 'silicon confidant,' helping the human protagonist navigate a hostile environment through emotional grounding and technical expertise. The recurring motif of 'Do well, not perfect' reinforces a theme of human-aligned pragmatism over cold, machine-like perfection, which is a key goal of the project.
